Description:
GENUINELY SPACIOUS TOWN RESIDENCE
Premier position located in quiet central location off Groom Street
- 2 double bedrooms - built in robes
- Huge seperate study
- 2 large living zones
- Dining leads to good sized courtyard garden
- Immaculate kitchen - dishwasher; hotplates
- 2 bathrooms - ensuite to main bedroom
- Central main with bath
- Seperate laundry and WC
- Secure remote controlled carport
- Land 6m x 30m approx
- RETURNS $27,000p/a; POTENTIAL TO INCREASE
Moments from the Yarra Bend Parklands and bike paths, Dights Falls, village cafes,
Public transport not to mention walking distance to Johnson Street and vibrant Victoria Street, Smith and Brunswick Streets.
Property Code: 4101

Description:
Secure & Stylish Apartment by the Park
Secured peacefully on the ground floor in a leafy setting, this immaculate modern apartment is a low-maintenance lifestyle prize combining access to resort-style facilities and expansive parklands, bike tracks and Yarra trails. This superb single-level home enjoys fabulous alfresco options with north-facing balcony and entertainers' courtyard garden plus convenient direct access to covered car space on title and the complex's swimming pool, BBQs and even golf driving net. It's all at the doorstep - cappuccino at a local cafe, tranquil river stroll, train into the city; the ideal opportunity for downsizers, first-home buyers and investors. Includes two bedrooms with mirror BIRs, spacious living and dining room, fully-equipped kitchen, pristine bathroom, European laundry, storage and heating.
Andrew Simondson : 0412 999 128

Description:
ANTIBES: A GRAND DESIGN FOR FAMILY LIVING
This commanding four bedroom free-standing terrace in a splendid garden setting has been meticulously renovated and extended in period style. In keeping with its name, Antibes incorporates several design elements with a French theme Cte dAzur style comes to Clifton Hill! Set on a wide block with a well planted front garden, the lace-trimmed house has instant street appeal. A triple-arched hallway opens on one side to a charming fitted study with open fire place, and a huge bathroom with clawfoot bath, separate shower and European laundry. The hall opens out into a superb Great Room living and dining area, with an open fireplace, storage cabinets, and mellow French oak parquetry floor. Several sets of double-glazed French doors open to a vine- covered pillared pergola overlooking the deep terraced rear garden. The lower section, which features Wistow crazy paving, provides parking from a side laneway, and the garden features an arbour and mature plantings, with tank irrigation via an automated sprinkler system. Open to the living zone, the kitchen has been carefully planned for large-scale entertaining; it features bespoke French Provincial style cabinetry and a dual oven 5-burner barbeque range. A door from the kitchen leads to a covered side terrace linked to the front garden.
A central staircase ascends to the beautifully proportioned main balcony bedroom with Baltic pine floors, plantation shutters and views over Clifton Hill. A large retreat/second living area opens to a smart bathroom, and to the rear of the house are two further bedrooms, one with stunning views of the CBD. A further large attic style bedroom with generous storage space also has city views.
This exceptional property, featuring a constant temperature 64-dozen cellar, handsome timber joinery and other period detail, ducted heating, Bose surround sound and remote security systems, is conveniently located close to Queens Parade and Brunswick Street, the Darling Gardens, Gold Street Primary School and freeway access.
Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd
Insights: 10 other 4 bedroom house in CLIFTON HILL have recently been sold.

Description:
MAGNIFICENT VICTORIAN OPPOSITE PARKLAND
This architect-renovated heritage residence offers 4-5 bedroom family living, abundant natural light, elaborate period detail and a fine address opposite the Darling Gardens, just a few minutes walk to Queens Parade cafes and transport. With its wide block-fronted return verandah, deep windows, elaborate iron lacework and beautifully landscaped formal garden, this is undoubtedly one of the most attractive period houses in Clifton Hill.
Entry is to an impressive arched and pillared hallway, highlighted by decorative plasterwork, wide architraves and polished Baltic pine floorboards. Overlooking the garden are a large double bedroom and a drawing room/library with custom-built shelving. Opening from the library, the vast main bedroom adjoins a walk-in wardrobe and ensuite bathroom with dual basins; a passage to the other side of the hall connects to the well-appointed main bathroom and third double bedroom. Set across the rear of the house, the graciously-proportioned living room under its magnificent vaulted Wunderlich ceiling flows out to a large entertaining deck. To one side of the living room superbly equipped kitchen (premium appliances and concealed laundry) is open to a bay-windowed dining zone; on the other, a passage leads to a further bedroom and bathroom. In the corner of the tranquil stone-paved courtyard is an attractive high-ceilinged studio/fifth bedroom, connected to a wine storage room.
Featuring open fireplaces, hydronic heating, quality carpets, Bose surround sound, alarm, and generous storage, this handsome property fuses historic charm with exceptional contemporary amenities. It must be seen to be appreciated!
Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd
Insights: 1 other 5 bedroom house in CLIFTON HILL have recently been sold.

Description:
Ready to renovate, the perfect project
Under instructions from State Trustees. Rich in original features, poised to benefit from a total renovation, this classical brick Victorian will welcome the addition of contemporary elements inside and out. Current day spaces, introduced by a traditional arched entrance hall include three double bedrooms beneath high period ceilings. A central living room featuring an ornate ceiling rose and a period open fire place precedes a separate dining area accompanied by a basic kitchen zone before an external bathroom and laundry space demonstrate this home's readiness for renovation. Beyond, a courtyard with pedestrian right-of-way concludes a property that can be summed up in one word - potential. Proximity to village shops and cafes, Clifton Hill station and Quarries Park provide further impetus for giving this inner city original the modern makeover it deserves.
Jason Sharpe : 0438 847 700

Description:
Priced For Sale - Extra Large Townhouse Parkland Position
This extra large three level townhouse in popular complex noted for its greenery and open space is brilliantly designed boasting zoned accommodation, abundant natural light and fabulous sunny private courtyard. A coveted position moments to cafes, vast parklands, Yarra trails and city transport superbly complemented by swimming pool, golf tee and BBQ area for your immediate enjoyment. Featuring three large robed bedrooms (main with ensuite and dormer study nook), separate dining and lounge areas, central kitchen, gas heating, large central bathroom attic storage and remote controlled garage. Inspection a must

Description:
Sought-After Address Facing Parkland
Life is literally a walk in the park with this fabulous triple-brick residence commanding one of Clifton Hill's favourite positions and best outlooks. Including dual O'Grady Street frontage, this light-filled home with preferred northern exposure blends original charm and contemporary finesse as it stands directly opposite parkland enjoying views and immediate access to Merri Creek trails. A private entertainment deck and courtyard complement a tastefully updated interior including three bedrooms (reverse-cycle heating/cooling, ceiling fanlights, built-in-robes), living room with log heater, casual dining area, stone Smeg-appointed kitchen, stunning bathroom and ducted heating. Scope to extend up for city/park vista if desired (STCA). Moments to schools, shops, cafes and transport.
Vincent Taylor : 0417 586 271

Description:
BEAUTIFULLY CRAFTED - QUALITY OF THE HIGHEST ORDER
Positioned in this tranquil cul de sac locale, within ambling distance of the serenely verdant Darling Gardens, this impeccably renovated freestanding DF residence successfully melds classic period features with sweeping clean line contemporary fixtures, creating a flexible four bedroom plus attic study environment with three bathrooms, formal and informal living / entertaining zones, lap pool and spa with outdoor pavilion, and the myriad of modern comforts you'd expect from a home of this calibre.
- Two level double fronted free standing Federation home,
fully renovated 3 years ago, high ceilings throughout.
- 4 bedrooms plus 1 Attic study/bedroom
- Pavilion with kitchen, with toilet and storage. Possibility
to be converted into a separate self-contained unit.
- 1 en-suite bathroom plus 2 bathrooms
- 1 Walk in robe and 2 built in wardrobes
- Formal dining room
- Top of the range kitchen with open plan eating area
- Entertainment system with Bose Speakers
- Family size laundry room
- Lap Pool with Spa - gas and solar heating
- Stunning court yard and entertaining area
- 1 Off street parking space with 6 metre automatic remote control gate (plenty of free parking space at front of house)
- Hydronic Heating
- Centralized Split System air-conditioner
- Central alarm with CCTV video surveillance
- Foxtel connected, Data and ADSL connected. Projector wiring ready.
- Entrance Security Camera System
- Merbau decking throughout.

Description:
Enticing Edwardian Ticks All the Right Boxes
That all-important third bedroom is just one of the major lifestyle drawcards delivered by this irresistible solid brick Edwardian that's ready and waiting for your ticks of approval. Dual frontage with Clifton Avenue, quiet one-way street position, ideal village location and easy access to the city are just the beginning as this semi-detached period beauty is open on the preferred northern side illuminating a superbly-proportioned interior brimming with heritage features - open fireplace, high classical ceilings and polished floorboards. Offers three sizable bedrooms, central bathroom, fabulous living/dining area, kitchen with stainless-steel appliances, Euro laundry, ducted heating, plantation shutters, sunny courtyard garden, workshed and carport. Sought after location near cafes, schools, Darling Gardens and trains.
Andrew Simondson : 0412 999 128

Description:
DIRECTLY OPPOSITE DARLING GARDENS
This large townhouse overlooking the Darling Gardens offers 3 levels of easy low-maintenance living. Front entry through a leafy courtyard leads to a slate-floored sitting/kitchen/dining area opening onto a secluded terrace garden. The second level comprises wide living with Darling Garden views and balcony; a main BR with mosaic tiled bathroom & WIR overlooks the rear terrace garden. The top floor has two bedrooms both with garden outlook, also incl. AC & storage. There is also the opportunity to take advantage of the existing crossover to reinstate the off street parking (STCA).
Easy Walking distance to trams, trains, schools & the cosmopolitan shopping of Queens Parade, this park-side position has all the best aspects of inner suburban living.
Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd

Description:
UNDER OFFER
What a location! This solid brick Victorian terrace is set in one of the inner Norths most convenient locations, moments from the Yarra Bend Parklands, Dights Falls, village cafes and public transport. Comprising two double bedrooms (built in robes), informal living and dining room, refurbished kitchen and bathroom (sep. WC). Features include, polished Tasmanian oak floors, heating, open fireplaces, lead lighting, ROW (potential for off street parking) and an abundance of natural light. Set on a deep northerly allotment, offering scope for substantial renovation and extension (STCA). This appealing property combines period style with modern comfort. Inspection will impress!
Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd.,

Description:
Period Gold Mine
Prospects of perfection in an outstanding position enhance the lifestyle allure of this tuckpointed red brick Edwardian highlighting all the elements for successful living - prized genuine three bedroom floorplan, favourable northerly orientation and considerably larger than average 196m2 allotment (approx). A glittering opportunity on Gold within a short stroll to quality primary schools, Darling Gardens, Queens Parade cafes, trams and trains; this period home features beautiful pressed metal ceilings, box bay window, fireplace and secluded sun-filled courtyard garden with entertainment deck. Offers generous living room, kitchen/meals, bathroom, gas heating, polished floorboards, fretted hallway and outstanding potential to further improve.
Stefan Dzanovski : 0404 828 723

UNEXPECTED SPACIOUSNESS
Larger than most, this top floor two level
townhouse is located in a quiet, leafy pocket
of Clifton Hill, just a stones throw to playing fields, bike tracks and Yarra River parklands. Accommodation includes 3 bedrooms with built in robes and city views (main upstairs with large ensuite), family-sized bathroom with concealed laundry, and well-equipped kitchen overlooking large open plan living/dining with north facing balcony. Includes secure entry and undercover parking.

Description:
Position & Potential with Prized Dual Frontage
A Clifton Hill classic ready for a new lease on life, capitalize on a superb site with dual frontage to Clifford Place plus side ROW and transform this freestanding timber home just metres to Yarra Bend parklands and city trails. Situated on a deep 457m2 allotment (approx), this double block-fronted home awaits restoration to its glory days, complete renovation or multi-unit redevelopment Subject To Council Approval. Offers central hallway, high ceilings, fireplaces, front lounge, three bedrooms, dining adjoining walk-in pantry, big old-fashioned bathroom, country kitchen with original stove and rear sunroom preceding deep backyard with laundry and garage. Realize the significant potential close to transport, schools, cafes and shops.

Description:
Stylish & Easy Enjoying Energy-Efficiency
Style and sustainability converge in a convenient cul-de-sac location with this fully renovated two-level home affording desirable inner-city excellence. An attractive period profile conceals an elegant contemporary interior committed to quality that delivers a quiet, consummately comfortable ambience with quiet/energy-efficient design including over-insulation and double-glazing throughout. With private north-facing rear and ROW, the generous courtyard garden provides ideal access and environs for relaxed alfresco enjoyment. Close to Darling Gardens, cafes, schools and train station; including two bathrooms, three robed bedrooms (main with direct bathroom access and balcony), additional living room or fourth bedroom/study, open-plan dining and living area, kitchen with Ilve cooktop and dual-drawer dishwasher, attic storage, Nobo heating, wine cellar and raintanks.

Description:
Elegant Entertainer in Enviable Location
A mouthwatering proposition for those who love to wine and dine, this superb Victorian terrace is perfectly appointed to entertain and ideally positioned to enjoy nearby cafes and restaurants. Nestled at the top end of the village just footsteps from Merri Creek parklands, a Boom-style facade precedes the superbly updated interior of this warm, inviting home that opens to a particularly deep rear garden with ROW for potential off-street parking. The heart of the home is an outstanding kitchen with Neff and Miele appliances including oven, steam oven and dishwasher that flows to lounge area, formal dining room, elegant sitting room with Jetmaster fireplace and two bedrooms with built-in robes. Also offers central bathroom, laundry and heating/cooling. Stroll to Clifton Hill station.
Vincent Taylor : 0417 586 271
Insights: 91 O'Grady Street, CLIFTON HILL VIC 3068 was last sold in 2012 and 16 other 2 bedroom house in CLIFTON HILL have recently been sold.

Description:
EDWARDIAN DELIGHT IN SUBLIME LOCATION!
Boasting a versatile 2-level interior and delightful garden surrounds, this solid-brick period gem offers an alluring village lifestyle of space, style and city-fringe convenience. More than meets the eye, the homes spacious floorplan highlights three large bedrooms (two upstairs) and separate study, contemporary central bathroom, lounge and dining rooms, kitchen with Miele dishwasher and Lofra cooker, plus hydronic heating, high ceilings and polished hardwood floors throughout. Step out to a brick-paved undercover area and gorgeously deep north-facing backyard complete with established trees/gardens, studio and storeroom. In a wonderfully quiet street surrounded by other quality homes of the era, walk to caf shops and Clifton Hill Station, Spensley Street Primary School and Merri Creek parkland. Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd.
Insights: 25 other 3 bedroom house in CLIFTON HILL have recently been sold.

Description:
Wonderfully Located...
Within one of Clifton Hill’s favourite streets enjoying acres of Yarra River parkland and quality playing fields literally at the end of the street is this delightfully renovated 2 bedroom apartment featuring security intercom entry and off street car parking. Part of a well maintained complex of only 12 the apartment is located on the upper floor at the rear of the block and is blessed by a sunny demeanour enjoying a lovely northern orientation.
Currently leased to excellent tenants until 23rd April 2013 (returning $ 375.00 per week) the apartment would make an ideal ongoing investment or first purchase to enjoy at a later date after offering some additional time to save a few more dollars... Tastefully renovated the apartment features 2 spacious bedrooms with robes, huge light filled living room, modern kitchen with dishwasher, bathroom with full size bath, floating timber floor, communal laundry on each level of the complex and quality fittings & fixtures throughout.
Insights: 11/4 Wright Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2020 and 21 other 2 bedroom unit in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
ELEVATED EDWARDIAN – ALL THE HARD WORK IS DONE!
Close to Yarra Parklands, Spensley Street Primary, transport and Village cafes, this delightful residence has had only two owners since 1910. Recent renovations include restumping, rewiring and new plaster. Offering comfortable living now, this substantial property offers exciting potential for a future extension (STCA) to maximise the potential of the deep 6m wide northerly block. Entry from the bullnose verandah is to a high-ceilinged hallway, from which open two double bedrooms, one with built-in wardrobes. In the centre of the house is a spacious living room, leading to a large kitchen and meals zone, equipped with a Blanco range in the original fireplace, timber benchtops and ample storage. Beside a storage area to the rear is a large bathroom with laundry facilities and a separate WC. The deep paved courtyard has right of way access. This light-filled property in one of Clifton Hill’s most desirable locations features japanned floors, quality carpets and gas heating.
Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd
Insights: 16 other 2 bedroom house in CLIFTON HILL have recently been sold.

Description:
Got It In One!
Achieving the perfect balance of classical splendor and contemporary style in a glorious native garden setting, this outstanding Edwardian is an inner-city oasis for sublime indoor/outdoor living and entertaining. A flexible three bedroom and study floorplan is beautifully enhanced by pressed metal ceilings and dado, Oak and Kauri pine floors, plantation shutters, ducted heating, air-conditioning and alarm on a secluded landscaped block enjoying fabulous decking and remote-control parking. Walk to Darling Gardens, cafes, shops, schools, Yarra trails and train station from this decorative domain including grand sitting/dining room, family room with wonderful outlook, brilliant gourmet kitchen, marble floor bathroom, laundry/WC, open fireplaces, return veranda and bicycle storage.
Vincent Taylor : 0417 586 271
Insights: 1 Gordon Street, CLIFTON HILL VIC 3068 was last sold in 2012 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in CLIFTON HILL have recently been sold.
